<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the maximum number of interfererring ranges. That&#39;s the number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distinct AllocationOrder values, which comes from MCRegisterClass::RegsSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For X86, that&#39;s 32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: find a way to get this, statically, in a programmatic way.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab0793310dc42beb76693d514d3ba970d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab0793310dc42beb76693d514d3ba970d">MaxInterferences</a> = 32;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Logically, we can think of the feature set given to the evaluator as a 2D</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// matrix. The rows are the features (see next). The columns correspond to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interferences. We treat the candidate virt reg as an &#39;interference&#39;, too, as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// its feature set is the same as that of the interferring ranges. So we&#39;ll have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaxInterferences + 1 columns and by convention, we will use the last column</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for the virt reg seeking allocation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#affc831a8c8709e57a337d64be6eccf1b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#affc831a8c8709e57a337d64be6eccf1b">CandidateVirtRegPos</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab0793310dc42beb76693d514d3ba970d">MaxInterferences</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad14e5d0def0abedca4ae24afdef519c1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad14e5d0def0abedca4ae24afdef519c1">NumberOfInterferences</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#affc831a8c8709e57a337d64be6eccf1b">CandidateVirtRegPos</a> + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of instructions that a specific live range might have is variable,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but we&#39;re passing in a single matrix of instructions and tensorflow saved</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// models only support a fixed input size, so we have to cap the number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions that can be passed along. The specific value was derived from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// experimentation such that the majority of eviction problems would be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// completely covered.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0f6a622f49aa7913d05fd8e3fa8ca13a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0f6a622f49aa7913d05fd8e3fa8ca13a">ModelMaxSupportedInstructionCount</a> = 300;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When extracting per-instruction features, the advisor will currently create</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a vector of size ModelMaxSupportedInstructionCount to hold the opcodes of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions relevant to the eviction problem, and a NumberOfInterferences &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ModelMaxSupportedInstructionCount matrix that maps LRs to the instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that they span.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac3e62fe1f9496414645a5f2cc59299e9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac3e62fe1f9496414645a5f2cc59299e9">InstructionsShape</a>&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0f6a622f49aa7913d05fd8e3fa8ca13a">ModelMaxSupportedInstructionCount</a>&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1f1fe70e29473f052b91e90544b809b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1f1fe70e29473f052b91e90544b809b">InstructionsMappingShape</a>&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">    1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad14e5d0def0abedca4ae24afdef519c1">NumberOfInterferences</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0f6a622f49aa7913d05fd8e3fa8ca13a">ModelMaxSupportedInstructionCount</a>&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When extracting mappings between MBBs and individual instructions, we create</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a vector of MBB frequencies, currently of size 100, which was a value</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// determined through experimentation to encompass the vast majority of eviction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// problems. The actual mapping is the same shape as the instruction opcodes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a271b262325043839db7d9e3da26b014d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a271b262325043839db7d9e3da26b014d">ModelMaxSupportedMBBCount</a> = 100;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a86e7665ea220c6f3f7076923fa15f1a8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a86e7665ea220c6f3f7076923fa15f1a8">MBBFrequencyShape</a>&#123;1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
